Serialized Form

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.Connection.RMI

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Connection.RMI.RMIClient

      class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          ClientControllerInterface controller
          ClientControllerInterface instance representing the controller for the RMI client. This is the main interface through which the client controls its local resources. It provides a set of methods that the client can call to manage its state and interact with the server.
        • registry
          Registry registry
          Registry instance used for the RMI client. This is the registry from which the client retrieves the remote server object. It is used to look up the server by its name and establish a connection to it.
        • server
          MainControllerInterface server
          MainControllerInterface instance representing the server for the RMI client. This is the main interface through which the client communicates with the server. It provides a set of methods that the client can call remotely to interact with the server.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Connection.RMI.RMIServer

      class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • handler
          MainControllerInterface handler
          This is an interface that contains the methods used in this class. The handler is an instance of MainControllerInterface which is used to manage the game logic.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Connection.Socket.Client.ClientCallsToServer

      class ClientCallsToServer extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clientController
          ClientControllerInterface clientController
          The clientController is an instance of ClientControllerInterface. It is used to control the client.
        • clientListener
          ClientListener clientListener
          The clientListener is an instance of ClientListener. It is used to handle server responses.
        • ois
          ObjectInputStream ois
          The ois (ObjectInputStream) is used for receiving objects from the server.
        • oos
          ObjectOutputStream oos
          The oos (ObjectOutputStream) is used for sending objects to the server.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Connection.Socket.Client.SocketClient

      class SocketClient extends Thread implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          ClientController controller
          Instance of ClientController. This controller is responsible for managing the client-side logic of the game. It is used to handle game events, manage game state, and interact with the server. It is set via the setController method and used in various methods throughout the class.

      class CheckUniqueNickNameResponse extends GenericMessage implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • isUnique
          boolean isUnique
          This is a private member variable of the CheckUniqueNickNameResponse class. It is a boolean that indicates whether a nickname is unique or not. If it is true, the nickname is unique. If it is false, the nickname is not unique. It is set in the constructor and can be accessed via the getIsUnique() method.

      class PlayerForSocket extends Player implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardsOnPlayAreaForSocket
          ArrayList<ArrayList<SideOfCard>> cardsOnPlayAreaForSocket
          This field represents the cards on the play area for a player in a socket-based connection. It is an ArrayList of ArrayList of SideOfCard objects, which is used to handle the conversion of data types for socket communication.
        • symbolsForSocket
          HashMap<Symbol,Integer> symbolsForSocket
          This field represents the symbols for a player in a socket-based connection. It is a HashMap of Symbol and Integer pairs, which is used to handle the conversion of data types for socket communication.

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Game

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Game.GameController

      class GameController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject
          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
          This method is used for custom deserialization of the GameController object. It reads the non-transient and non-static fields of the current class from the ObjectInputStream. The method does not need to concern itself with the state belonging to its superclasses or subclasses. Those states will be handled by the JVM calling their readObject methods. After reading the default object, it initializes the transient fields 'scheduler' and 'executor'.
          Parameters:
          in - the ObjectInputStream from which data is read
          Throws:
          IOException - if I/O errors occur while reading from the ObjectInputStream
          ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object could not be found
        • writeObject
          private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream out) throws IOException
          This method is used for custom serialization of the GameController object. It writes the non-transient and non-static fields of the current class to the ObjectOutputStream. The method does not need to concern itself with the state belonging to its superclasses or subclasses. Those states will be handled by the JVM calling their writeObject methods.
          Parameters:
          out - the ObjectOutputStream to which data is written
          Throws:
          IOException - if I/O errors occur while writing to the ObjectOutputStream

      • Serialized Fields

        • availableColors
          List<PawnColor> availableColors
          A list of available colors for the players. Each color is represented as a PawnColor enum.
        • currentPlayerIndex
          int currentPlayerIndex
          The index of the current player in the list of players. This index is used to keep track of whose turn it is in the game. It is initialized to 0, meaning the first player in the list is the current player at the start of the game. The index is updated each time a player finishes their turn, passing the turn to the next player in the list.
        • currentPlayerNickname
          String currentPlayerNickname
          The nickname of the current player. This is a string that represents the player's chosen nickname.
        • gameLoopThreads
          List<Thread> gameLoopThreads
          A list of Thread objects representing the threads running the game loop for each player. Each thread is responsible for managing the game actions of a specific player. The list is used to keep track of all active game loop threads, allowing the game controller to manage them as needed. For example, the game controller can interrupt all game loop threads when a player disconnects or the game ends.
        • id
          int id
          The unique identifier for the game. This is a constant value that is set when the game is created.
        • listener
          GameListener listener
          The GameListener object that listens for game events.
        • model
          PlayGround model
          The current game model. The game model represents the state of the game, including the game board, the players, and the cards.
        • nicknames
          ArrayList<String> nicknames
          An ArrayList of strings representing the nicknames of the players in the game.
        • numPlayers
          int numPlayers
          The number of players in the game. This is a constant value that is set when the game is created.
        • playersWhoChoseObjective
          int playersWhoChoseObjective
          The number of players who have chosen their objective. This is an integer that is incremented each time a player chooses their objective.
        • status
          GameStatus status
          The current status of the game. The status is represented as a GameStatus enum.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Game.GameListener

      class GameListener extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • players
          List<ClientControllerInterface> players
          A list of ClientControllerInterface objects representing the players in the game. This list is used to manage the players' state and actions during the game. It is initialized as an empty ArrayList at the start of the game.

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Main

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.Card

      class Card extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • idCard
          int idCard
          The ID of the card. This is a unique identifier for the card. It is final because once a card is created, its ID cannot be changed.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.Corner

      class Corner extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • covered
          boolean covered
          Represents the covered status of the corner. If true, the corner is covered.
        • hidden
          boolean hidden
          Represents the hidden status of the corner. If true, the corner is hidden.
        • nextCorner
          Corner nextCorner
          Represents the next Corner of the current corner. It can be null.
        • parentCard
          SideOfCard parentCard
          Represents the parent card of the corner. It is the card that this corner belongs to.
        • position
          CornerPosition position
          Represents the position of the corner on the card. It is a value from the CornerPosition enumeration.
        • symbol
          Symbol symbol
          Represents the symbol of the corner. It can be null.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.DispositionObjectiveCard

      class DispositionObjectiveCard extends ObjectiveCard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • CentralCardColor
          CardColors CentralCardColor
          CentralCardColor is an attribute of the DispositionObjectiveCard class. It represents the color of the central card in the card disposition. The color is defined by the CardColors enumeration.
        • Neighbors
          Map<Position,CardColors> Neighbors
          Neighbors is an attribute of the DispositionObjectiveCard class. It represents a map of the neighboring cards around the central card in the card disposition. The map associates each Position (representing the relative position of a neighbor) to a CardColors value (representing the color of the card in that position).

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.GoldCard

      class GoldCard extends PlayCard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • point
          int point
          An integer that represents the point value of the Gold Card. This value can be changed after initialization.
        • requirement
          HashMap<Symbol,Integer> requirement
          A HashMap that represents the requirement of the Gold Card. The requirement is a map of symbols and their counts. This is a final variable, meaning that it cannot be changed once it has been initialized.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.InitialCard

      class InitialCard extends PlayCard implements Serializable

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.ObjectiveCard

      class ObjectiveCard extends Card implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • points
          ObjectivePoints points
          The points of the Objective Card. This attribute represents the points a player can earn by achieving the objective on the card. It is of type ObjectivePoints enum.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.PlayCard

      class PlayCard extends Card implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • Back
          SideOfCard Back
          The back side of the PlayCard. This is a final attribute, meaning it cannot be changed after the PlayCard object is created. It is of type SideOfCard, which represents one side of the PlayCard.
        • color
          CardColors color
          The color of the PlayCard. This is a final attribute, meaning it cannot be changed after the PlayCard object is created. It is of type CardColors, an enumeration that represents the possible colors a PlayCard can have.
        • Front
          SideOfCard Front
          The front side of the PlayCard. This is a final attribute, meaning it cannot be changed after the PlayCard object is created. It is of type SideOfCard, which represents one side of the PlayCard.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.PointPerCoveredCorner

      class PointPerCoveredCorner extends GoldCard implements Serializable

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.PointPerVisibleSymbol

      class PointPerVisibleSymbol extends GoldCard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • goldGoal
          Symbol goldGoal
          The symbol that this card awards points for. This symbol is specified when the card is created and cannot be changed afterwards. It is used to calculate the points that a player earns when playing this card.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.ResourceCard

      class ResourceCard extends PlayCard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • point
          boolean point
          A boolean value that represents the point of the card. It indicates whether the card has been played on the front side. If the card has been played on the front side, the value is true; otherwise, it is false.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.SideOfCard

      class SideOfCard extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • color
          CardColors color
          Color of the card. It is the same as the parent card's color.
        • corners
          Corner[][] corners
          Matrix of corners of the card.
        • InConfiguration
          boolean InConfiguration
          This attribute is going to be used when we search for the configuration: a card cannot be counted twice when searching for a specific configuration so the card can be taken into consideration only if this attribute is set to false.
        • parentCard
          PlayCard parentCard
          The card that has this SideOfCard as one of its sides.
        • positionOnArea
          Pair<Integer,Integer> positionOnArea
          Row and Column occupied by the card in the PlayArea.
        • symbols
          HashMap<Symbol,Integer> symbols
          Map of symbols of the card. They can be placed in the corner or in the middle.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards.SymbolObjectiveCard

      class SymbolObjectiveCard extends ObjectiveCard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • goal
          HashMap<Symbol,Integer> goal
          This is a HashMap that represents the goal of the SymbolObjectiveCard. The goal is a map of symbols to integers, where each symbol represents a specific goal, and the corresponding integer represents the number of times that goal needs to be reached. This attribute is final, meaning that it cannot be changed once it has been initialized.

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayGround

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayGround.Deck

      class Deck extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • deck
          ArrayList<? extends Card> deck
          This is an ArrayList that holds objects of a class that extends the Card class. The wildcard (?) is used to allow for different types of cards to be stored in the deck. The extends keyword indicates that the ArrayList can hold objects of the Card class or any of its subclasses.
        • filepath
          String filepath
          This is a String that holds the file path to the resources directory. It is used to locate the JSON files that are used to create the deck of cards.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayGround.PlayArea

      class PlayArea extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardsOnArea
          List<List<SideOfCard>> cardsOnArea
          A dynamic matrix of SideOfCard objects. This matrix represents the current state of the play area. A SideOfCard object is used because when a card is present in the play area, the player has already made a choice about what side they want to play.
        • symbols
          Map<Symbol,Integer> symbols
          A map that contains all the symbols that are visible on the play area. This map is used for checking the requirements of gold cards and for attributing points for objective cards and gold cards. The key is the symbol and the value is the number of occurrences of that symbol in the play area.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayGround.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardsInHand
          ArrayList<PlayCard> cardsInHand
          The cardsInHand attribute represents the cards that the Player has in hand. It is an ArrayList of PlayCard objects.
        • initialCard
          InitialCard initialCard
          The initialCard attribute represents the initial card of the Player. It is an instance of the InitialCard class.
        • nickname
          String nickname
          The nickname attribute represents the nickname of the Player. It is a String.
        • pawnColor
          PawnColor pawnColor
          The pawnColor attribute represents the color of the Player's pawn. It is an instance of the PawnColor enumeration.
        • personalObjectiveCard
          ObjectiveCard personalObjectiveCard
          The personalObjectiveCard attribute represents the personal objective card of the Player. It is an instance of the ObjectiveCard class.
        • playArea
          PlayArea playArea
          The playArea attribute represents the play area of the Player. It is an instance of the PlayArea class.
        • reconnected
          boolean reconnected
          The reconnected attribute indicates whether the Player has reconnected to the game. It is a boolean.
        • round
          int round
          The round attribute represents the current round of the Player. It is an integer.
        • score
          int score
          The score attribute represents the score of the Player. It is an integer.
